subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The Spartans head to the Final Four on the back of a skinny guard who has gone from unheralded recruit to superstar and been a picture of poise in the N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: The Spartans head to the Final Four on the back of a skinny guard who has gone from unheralded recruit to superstar and been a picture of poise in the N.C.A.A. tournament.
